alert.note: Alert for Prince Edward (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 26 at 9:00PM EDT until June 26 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN PRINCE EDWARD COUNTY... At 900 PM EDT, Although thunderstorms have ended in the warned area, doppler Radar indicated that between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Some flooding has been reported on area roadways and poor drainage areas. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Farmville, Hampden Sydney, Prospect, Allens Mill, Elam and Tuggle. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
